title: Helping Others Improve EP 26# (Never Judge, In Bronze V)

embed.description: You can get away with a lotta stupid shit in B5. Doesn't mean you should try though! -- Twitter: https://twitter.com/YaseiDoubutsu Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/YaseiDoubutsuXD/ Pateron: https://t.co/pQ5xovdbqe -- This is part of a series, where I try and help others go from Bronze to silver. Heck maybe even gold.

body:
A Brand that had TP + Ignite? -Check!
A good support who rushes sightstone! - Check!
The support gets blue trinket! -...Check?

Once again, point out things that I may have missed.
To help these guys improve.

replies.body:
Another note for Exhaust, is that it reduces Armor and MR, so it can achieve the same damage output as an ignite at times, while also slowing the target and reducing their Damage.

EDIT: I may just put all my things here

Veigar is Qing Yasuo because that also gets stacks, which is something riot added to veigar.

Yas has the support mastery? (he got a +1 when he missed a minion.)

Yas could have windwalled the Poppy ult to my knowledge as well when she did it in mid lane.

Farsight is meh on a support, you have to spend more money on pinks to clear wards with it, though you do get slightly more vision in the trade, benefits you most if Jungler is always smiting Raptors and has the Upgraded Red.

Come to think of it i don't recall an exhaust.

That's it.

All I must say is this, regardless of what division you are, how many champions you own, runes you have, or which skin you pick, remember this:

1) THAT IS ANOTHER HUMAN BEING YOU ARE PLAYING WITH!
2) YOU DONT KNOW HOW OLD THEY ARE, IF THEY ARE "YOUNG" THAT DOESNT MEAN THEY ARE TOO STUPID AND IF THEY ARE "OLD" THAT THEY ARE TOO SLOW!
3) THEY MIGHT HAVE HAD A REALLY F%^K$#G S#@T DAY AND THE LAST THING THEY NEEDED' WAS TO BE TOLD "THEY ARE LESS THAN NOTHING!"
4) THEIR ENGLISH MAY NOT BE CAMBRIDGE UNIVERSITY QUALITY, SO LET OTHER PLAYERS KNOW IN ADVANCE IF ENGLISH IS NOT YOUR FIRST LANGUAGE (IT IS THE INTERNATIONAL STANDARD LANGUAGE THOUGH), DO THIS OPENLY AND IN AN HONEST MANNER SO THAT YOUR TEAM UNDERSTANDS! (THEY WILL!).
5) TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES OCCUR, BE OPEN ABOUT THE ISSUE WITH YOUR TEAM (NOT THE ONE YOU ARE COMPETING AGAISNT!) AND HELP YOUR TEAM MATE(S) TO TROUBLESHOOT THE ISSUE.
6) IT IS UP TO "YOU!", EACH ONE OF "US!", TO PROMOTE THE USE OF SOLUTIONS AND ALSO TO DEMOTE THE PEOPLE FEEDING "THE" PROBLEMS!

Over and out.

Void Escapee, aka Simon Lutze.

I'm amusing your talking to everyone that I spectate, and just everyone in general.
Woke up, with some guy All capping at me XD

But you bring up fair points, I try and say this all the time.
